description:
Adobe Illustrator software is quite possibly the best vector-drawing environment that allows you to make graphics that scale across media. You could create and resize logos, icons, website buttons and more without worrying about a blurry end result.

This class, taught by Adobe Illustrator pro Max Burnside will teach you how to create amazing icons with Illustrator.

By the end of this class you will have all the skills to start making beautiful icons that will make your website or project stand out.
title: Creating Icons with Illustrator
